welcome.title: Welcome to {app}
welcome.body: Sign in securely and keep your data synced.

slides.title: Cross-Platform Sync
slides.subtitle: Always in Sync
slides.description: Keep your data seamlessly synced across all your devices. Start on your phone, continue on your tablet, and finish on your desktop.

slides.title: Secure & Private
slides.subtitle: Your Data is Yours
slides.description: With end-to-end encryption, your data is for your eyes only. We can't read it, and neither can anyone else.

slides.title: Offline Access
slides.subtitle: Work Anywhere, Anytime
slides.description: No internet? No problem. Access and manage your data even when you're offline. Changes will sync automatically when you reconnect.
